me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.datastore

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.datastore.Message

  • public final class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a retrieved message. Static methods in the class enumerate through all registered MessageProvider instances to find a specified message.
    Author:
    Glen Husman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Message(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Creates an instance of Message with the specified key and value.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String get(java.lang.String key)
      Search all MessageProviders registered via the ServicesManager, sorting by priority, to find the specified message.
      java.lang.String getKey()
      Gets the key of this message.
      java.lang.String getUnformattedValue()
      Gets the value of this message, as input.
      java.lang.String getValue()
      Gets the value of this message, color code formatted with the & character.
      static boolean set(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Set the specified key to map to the specified value in the highest-priority read/write MessageProvider registered via the ServicesManager.
      static void setAll(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Sets the specified key to map to the specified value in all registered read/write MessageProvider instances.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String key,
       java.lang.String value)
        Creates an instance of Message with the specified key and value. Does not add to any MessageProvider.
        Parameters:
        key - The MessageProvider key for this message.
        value - The value of the message.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static java.lang.String get(java.lang.String key)
        Search all MessageProviders registered via the ServicesManager, sorting by priority, to find the specified message.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the message to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The color formatted message associated with the specified key, or null if not found.

      • set

        public static boolean set(java.lang.String key,
          java.lang.String value)
        Set the specified key to map to the specified value in the highest-priority read/write MessageProvider registered via the ServicesManager.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the message to set.
        value - The value of the message to set.
        Returns:
        True if the set was successful; false otherwise.

      • setAll

        public static void setAll(java.lang.String key,
          java.lang.String value)
        Sets the specified key to map to the specified value in all registered read/write MessageProvider instances.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the message to set.
        value - The value of the message to set.

      • getKey

        public java.lang.String getKey()
        Gets the key of this message.
        Returns:
        The MessageProvider backend storage key.

      • getUnformattedValue

        public java.lang.String getUnformattedValue()
        Gets the value of this message, as input.
        Returns:
        The unformatted value of the message.

      • getValue

        public java.lang.String getValue()
        Gets the value of this message, color code formatted with the & character.
        Returns:
        The color formatted value of the message.
